description: Primes with 38 as smallest positive primitive root.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1300
mathematica: Prime[ Select[ Range[ 100000], PrimitiveRoot[ Prime[ # ] ] == 38 & ] ](* or *)Select[ Prime@Range@100000, PrimitiveRoot@# == 38 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 11 2001 *)
